survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer behaviors and preferences regarding sustainable grocery shopping practices, including packaging preferences, local sourcing, and willingness to pay for eco-friendly options.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop for groceries?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all typical shopping frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you shop for groceries?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable grocery shopping practices do you currently engage in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Using bulk bins to reduce packaging
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participants.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable grocery shopping practices do you currently engage in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Using bulk bins to reduce packaging

questions.question_text: How important is it to you that grocery products are packaged in eco-friendly materials?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice responses. Ensure balanced options.

script.question_text: How important is it to you that grocery products are packaged in eco-friendly materials?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose sustainable grocery products?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose sustainable grocery products?

questions.question_text: How much more would you be willing to pay for groceries with eco-friendly packaging compared to conventional packaging?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How much more would you be willing to pay for groceries with eco-friendly packaging compared to conventional packaging?

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from shopping more sustainably? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'No barriers' to capture those without obstacles.

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from shopping more sustainably? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How do you typically learn about sustainable grocery products?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: How do you typically learn about sustainable grocery products?

questions.question_text: Would you participate in a grocery store's recycling program for packaging (e.g., returning containers for reuse)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge willingness.

script.question_text: Would you participate in a grocery store's recycling program for packaging (e.g., returning containers for reuse)?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see in grocery stores?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see in grocery stores?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of sustainable grocery options in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of sustainable grocery options in your area?
